title: Transformers: Resparked (fanedit)
description:
Transformers: Resparked
A fanedit by Reave

What is it about? By removing the most silly parts of the film and some of the over-the-top scenes this is now a much tighter and way more thrilling movie. 

original film name: Transformers
new film name : Transformers: Resparked (1.1)
film studio name : Pararmount/Dreamworks
edit crew name : Reave
Date Original Film Was Released : July 3rd, 2007
Date Edit Was Released : March 9th, 2008
Original Runtime : 133 Minutes
New Runtime : 122 Minutes
Amount of time Cut/Added : 11 minutes

Cuts removed/added/extended : 
(mild SPOILERS)

Cut Lennox talking to his wife and kid (fart joke). 

Cut first time Epps looks at Blackout with binoculars, itÃƒÂ¢??s a little ludicrous to think that he would sit there so long and look at him twice. 

Cut out spitwad scene. Tightened up classroom scene. 

Cut out second naval tool innuendo ÃƒÂ¢??joke/laughing/ÃƒÂ¢??stop signÃƒÂ¢??.

Cut Sam from ÃƒÂ¢??alright Mojo, iÃƒÂ¢??ve got the car, now I need the girlÃƒÂ¢?? all the way to parents introduction. No more mirror/zit scene, ebay scene, mojo crack addict scene, etc.

Cut news report in SamÃƒÂ¢??s room. too much info for the network news to have on the base attack. 

Cut Sam calling Miles and telling him that ÃƒÂ¢??satanÃƒÂ¢??s camaro is stalking himÃƒÂ¢??. Ha-ha. 

Cut out a few frames of Sam flipping his bike over. The editing was poor, and if you looked at it, they were repeating footage, making it seem like he was in the air too long. 

Cut several seconds of Sam making small talk with Mikaela after falling off bike (while being chased by his carÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¦ that was driving itselfÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¦and had turned into a robot the previous night).

Trimmed a few frames of BarricadeÃƒÂ¢??s two swings at Sam (heÃƒÂ¢??s a lightning fast ninja when fighting Bumblebee, but a lumbering hulk when trying to swat a human?). I also trimmed it to again make Sam look as if he is trying to get away from a GIANT F#@KING ROBOT!

Cut Sam saying ÃƒÂ¢??what you mean like ET? pfffftÃƒÂ¢?? I know itÃƒÂ¢??s a reference to Spielberg, and itÃƒÂ¢??s real cute, but ShiaÃƒÂ¢??s acting at that point is a little iffy.

Trimmed Optimus slamming into Sector7 SUV for effect (to make it more of a suprise/shock). 

Cut Bumblebee pissing scene. I know that the agents are wet in the scene after that, but IÃƒÂ¢??m going to chalk that up to sweat. If anyone can teach me how to clean that up digitally, IÃƒÂ¢??d be glad to, but for now, I just had to get rid of that ridiculous scene. 

Cut ÃƒÂ¢??whereÃƒÂ¢??s Sector 7? WouldnÃƒÂ¢??t you like to know?ÃƒÂ¢?? 

Cut FrenzyÃƒÂ¢??s landing/more goofy noises from his fall off dam ledge.

Merged footage of bumblebee looking around and then slamming face shield down. (it was a pain in the dick to line up video/sound spent 4 hours alone on that one 10 second scene. Eat your heart out ILM!). Cut out Sam talking in between shots. 

Cut Frenzy saying ÃƒÂ¢??duh/uhÃƒÂ¢?? when he tries breaking into the room with the crew. 
Trimmed scene slightly. 

Trimmed 4 frames of Secretary of Defense Keller breaking glass to make the timing more realistic. 

Cut Simmons ÃƒÂ¢??get out of the wayÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¦ÃƒÂ¢?? trying to blowtorch frenzyÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¦..frenzy shooting discs into room, Goodburger screaming about it, Keller sending message, Air Force responding. 

Cut smiley, dipshit kid sayingÃƒÂ¢?? COOOL MOM!ÃƒÂ¢?? I worked on this longer than any other shot, and should have given up quite frankly, but god I hated it. IÃƒÂ¢??m pretty proud that I got it to work. 

Cut FRENZY ÃƒÂ¢??OH SHIT!ÃƒÂ¢?? (I know itÃƒÂ¢??s a G1 reference, but itÃƒÂ¢??s gay here.) 

Cut Epps saying ÃƒÂ¢??that ainÃƒÂ¢??t friendlyÃƒÂ¢??. 

Cut ÃƒÂ¢??IÃƒÂ¢??ll drive, you shoot!ÃƒÂ¢??. ItÃƒÂ¢??s a weird little mix-up of cuts, that mostly works, but being my most hated line in the whole movie, it just had to be removed. I had to steal sound effects from a different battle to get this one to work. IÃƒÂ¢??m pretty happy with it, considering I got to remove one of the worst lines from the movie.

I kind of like Mountain Dew bot, but it was impossible to cut the scene up (without rebuilding the audio track from scratch, fuck that.) to remove the other bots. IÃƒÂ¢??m happy with it, and it keeps things rolling. Besides, there was some awful acting in the whole scene. 

Trimmed a couple of seconds in the Allspark hand-off to try and trim the hang time, and increase the urgency. It seemed as if Sam was taking his time to get rid of this thing that giant fucking robots were chasing him for. 

Left in michael bay getting flicked into a car by megatron.  

Cut ÃƒÂ¢??bring the rainÃƒÂ¢?? #2 

Cried about not being able to cut Link Park song from the end (yet, damn it!). 

---------------------------------------------
Fanedit details: DVD contains the edited movie (5.1 mix/anamorphic widescreen), a thank you list and maybe something else tooÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¦.

Your intention for this fanedit: To remove most of the over the top, silly parts of the film, and to tighten up the story overall.

Your way to achieve your intention: Trimming small parts of Frenzy, the computer kids, and other extraneous human characters. Eliminating unnecessary dialogue/scenes.

Hardware and software information: (Software) DVD Decrypter, Womble, TMPGEnc, DVDFab Decrypter, Adobe Photoshop and DVD-Lab Pro. (Hardware) Pentium D 2.6Ghz Dual core processor, Sony DRU-710A, 2 GB ram.

Additional Comment: This is the first, ÃƒÂ¢??softÃƒÂ¢?? cut, with a ÃƒÂ¢??hardÃƒÂ¢?? cut and a G1 (Generation One) cut to follow in order.

Time needed for the edition: Planning - 3 months. Editing - 4 months, on and off. Creating DVD - 2 weeks. Yeah, 7 1/2 months. IÃƒÂ¢??m an obsessive compulsive perfectionist. Sue me.

persons involved: 1 (plus some excellent help from a few members who are in the ÃƒÂ¢??Thank youÃƒÂ¢?? list in the DVD menu credits.
